title: CGPA 7.8 after 6th Sem ‚Äì Can I still sit for most companies and aim for Tier 1 placements
content:
My 6th semester just ended and we got our results today. I currently have a CGPA of 7.8. With placements starting in 7th sem, I am concerned about whether this CGPA will help me land a tier 1 job.

I haven‚Äôt received any summer internship offers from companies and I didn‚Äôt apply for internships in any research labs either. I‚Äôve mainly been focusing on improving my DSA in these 2 months. I keep hearing from seniors that many companies have an 8 CGPA cutoff and that‚Äôs really scaring the sh\*t out of me, especially how tough the job market is right now.

Would really appreciate any guidance, tips or just straight-up honesty. Am I already cooked or do I still have a chance? üò≠üôè

comments.body: In the initial days of your placement most companies place emphasis on a cgpa of 8+ for initial shortlisting. But later on they might lower the bar to 7+. Most importantly you should be preparing for the aptitude and other subject related matters because that's what matters the most towards the end.
I ended up just below 7.5  :( .  How cooked am I ?
You can even get a tier 1 job if you're lucky enough to get shortlisted. Don't worry.
Thanks a lot for the reassurance !
